subject: No Haptics delivered with Order #SSN5137
description_text:
Hello,

I did not receive the haptic vam pro motors or the 2 extra mounts I
ordered. Only the Pedals and the RGB baseplate were delivered.


[image: image.png]

This is the picture from the FedEx website verifying delivery. Thank you
for your attention to this matter.

Nicholas Adamicki

conversations.body_text: Hi B H,    Our vibration feedback motors are shipped separately. I will check the shipment status for you after the holiday.
ID 为 10026 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单10026  
      主题: Request update on haptic motors  
      描述:  Someone was supposed to let me know what's up with the 3 haptic motors and 2 mounts that weren't delivered.    
 Thanks, 
 Nicholas Adamicki
Hi B H,  Have you already received your VAM Pro motors?

No, not yet. I have not received them. There is no tracking number for them
either.

On Tue, Jan 6, 2026, 10:58 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi B H,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195321874
